query: What is our company's vacation policy for full-time employees?
response: Full-time employees are entitled to 20 days of paid vacation per year. Unused vacation days can be carried over to the next year, up to a maximum of 5 days.
context_chunks: HR Policy Section 4.2: Full-time employees receive 20 days of paid time off (PTO) annually. Employees may carry over unused PTO up to 5 days into the following calendar year. Any PTO beyond this limit will be forfeited.
HR Policy Section 4.3: Part-time employees receive PTO on a prorated basis calculated by their average weekly hours.

query: How do I submit an expense report?
response: To submit an expense report, log into the Concur system, create a new report, attach receipts for all expenses over $25, and submit for manager approval. Reports must be submitted within 30 days of the expense.
context_chunks: Finance Policy 7.1: All expense reports must be submitted through the Concur expense management system. Receipts are required for any expense exceeding $25.
Finance Policy 7.2: Expense reports must be submitted within 30 days of incurring the expense. Late submissions require VP-level approval.
Finance Policy 7.3: After submission, reports are routed to the employee's direct manager for approval.

query: What are the password requirements for our systems?
response: Passwords must be at least 12 characters long, contain uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. Passwords expire every 90 days and cannot be reused within 12 password cycles.
context_chunks: IT Security Policy 3.2: Password Requirements - Minimum 12 characters, must include: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and at least one special character (!@#$%^&*).
IT Security Policy 3.3: Password expiration is set to 90 days. Password history prevents reuse of the last 12 passwords.
IT Security Policy 3.4: Multi-factor authentication is required for all remote access.

query: What is the process for requesting a new software license?
response: Submit a request through ServiceNow IT portal. Include business justification, cost center, and number of licenses needed. IT will review within 5 business days.
context_chunks: IT Procurement Policy 2.1: Software license requests must be submitted through the ServiceNow IT Service Portal under 'Software Request'.
IT Procurement Policy 2.2: Required information includes: software name, business justification, cost center code, and quantity of licenses.
IT Procurement Policy 2.3: IT Procurement team will review requests and respond within 5 business days.

query: How does our company handle data retention?
response: Customer data is retained for 7 years after the end of the business relationship. Internal documents are retained for 5 years. After the retention period, data is securely deleted following our data destruction protocol.
context_chunks: Data Governance Policy 5.1: Customer personal data must be retained for a minimum of 7 years following termination of the business relationship for regulatory compliance.
Data Governance Policy 5.2: Internal business documents have a standard retention period of 5 years unless otherwise specified by legal requirements.
Data Governance Policy 5.3: Upon expiration of retention periods, data must be securely destroyed following the procedures outlined in Appendix B.
